name: Black Frideal
description:
HELLO AND WELCOME TO BLACK FRIDEAL !

Context

Hello ! We are 5 video games student from 2nd grade at Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia (IIM). In a 4 days gamejam, with the theme of Black friday, we work together to provide you Black Frideal.

Pitch

Oh! Hello and welcome to OUR multimedia store! What?! Black Friday is tomorrow ?! Anyway, he will have many more customers. I need you, you'll have to find the ideal item for them. The main goals of making a maximum profit without the customers. My shop was reported as suspect by the police. Just occupy yourself by selling items and take policemen away from the store. I count on you !

Make the most profit by selling items :

Sell as many items as you can to reach the money quota requested by the store.

Listen to what customers tell you to adapt what you sell to them :

Listen to customer requests to sell the item that suits them the most and have more money.

Take the police away from the store :

Use the money you earn and activate distractions to keep the police away from the store.

...

  • Type : visual novel - point & click SOLO
  • Platform: PC
